body:
This is an idea that I have seen on other servers like hypixel or whatever. So Idk if people actually get targeted or anything because there a youtuber why not add the youtuber rank I'm so they could disguise themself with /Nick or So they won't get targeted as much.

Idk if this would work but tell me your thoughts

title: [SUG]Youtube Rank

replies.body: There's already a Youtuber/VIP rank that exists on the server. You just haven't seen anyone with the tag.
replies.body_tagged: There's already a Youtuber/VIP rank that exists on the server. You just haven't seen anyone with the tag.

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/woofless jajajjaajjajajjajajjaj
There are people with media rank, but no famous/popular youtuber gets on the sever, so /nick will probably never be needed.

replies.body: This rank already exists, except it is labelled as "YouTuber" and "VIP". I may bring it up in the senior staff meeting however about lowering the subscriber count, so there's more encouragement for posting videos.
replies.body_tagged: This rank already exists, except it is labelled as "YouTuber" and "VIP". I may bring it up in the senior staff meeting however about lowering the subscriber count, so there's more encouragement for posting videos.

replies.body: Seriously? Just ditch media and ditch youtuber. There's no one advertising avicus commercially so the labeling is just attention seeking.

replies.body: Nobody but very few have the ranks, I don't understand how someone having it is "attention seeking".
